findings.title: Unchecked allowance value in safeTransferFrom & safeBatchTransferFrom function
findings.description: The _value passed in the arguments is deducted from the allowance without checking if the caller was approved with the sufficient value in the first place, leading to inadequate error messages.

findings.title: Ambiguous and Repetitive error messages found in require statements
findings.description: The require statements in certain functions include very ambiguous error messages. Moreover, in some instances, one similar error message is repeated in multiple require statements which badly affects the code readability and also throws inadequate messages to the user in case of function revert.
